name: One Minute Arena
description:
What is OMA?

One Minute Arena is a small top-down action shooter. Enter the arenas and try to survive and get the best time!

After a minute, a surprise awaits you...

Collecting Coins

Collect coins and use them to buy equipment and items after an unsuccessful run to be better prepared for further tries. Or improve your time with it.

If you complete an arena, you get to keep your coins. However, if you die in an arena, you lose the coins you collected there.

Pro:

  • The game will not make you addicted!
  • Highscore (Besttime)
  • Buy items
  • Statistics stuff
  • Some things are nice (Trash)

Contra:

  • Sounds need more polish
  • Graphic is poor
  • Repetitive gameplay
